name: 神魔之塔 - Tower of Saviors
name_original: 神魔之塔 - Tower of Saviors
description:
Brand new version 19.0 “The First Human Ancestors” will debut on 20 Apr (Mon)! The story will continue to the 2nd chapter unveiling how Eldus created “Earthlings” as a combat tool in the plot. At the same time, Earthlings are trying to break free from the control of the Eldus. Besides, new character “Giselle” will be available for redemption in Arena.

In ancient times, Eldus intended to exterminate the indigenous races in the realm in order to snatch the fundamental power. Therefore, they created inferior lifeforms named “Earthlings”, the origin of humans. They were born to be tools, but the Earthlings decided to overthrow this cruel fate through a revolution.

Element-filled soils and enchanting circles are the required materials for Earthlings creation. To avoid their rebellion, Shamash the Eldus has implanted “fear” into their bodies. However, can fear really stop them from pursuing freedom? The answer is waiting for you to explore.

Tower of Saviors is totally free! Summoners may purchase Diamonds for drawing rare cards, restoring Stamina and extending the Inventory limit, etc.

Join us now to end the war once and for all!

Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TowerOfSaviors
Official Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/towerofsaviors
